misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a golfer hailing from the esteemed Golf Pirkkala, is set to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. This Tampere resident is known for his meticulous approach to the game.

While Ofri has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy, his dedication to the sport is evident in every swing. His appreciation for course design, particularly the thoughtful work of the late Kosti Kuronen, reflects a deep understanding of the nuances of golf. We look forward to watching Ofri compete in the upcoming tournament.
